              def content_security_policy
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                policy = [
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  "default-src 'self'",
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  "script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net",
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  "style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net",
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  "img-src 'self' data: https: http:",
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  "font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com",
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  "connect-src 'self' https:",
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  "media-src 'self'",
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  "object-src 'none'",
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  "base-uri 'self'",
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  "form-action 'self'",
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  "frame-ancestors 'none'",
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  "upgrade-insecure-requests"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                ]
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                policy.join('; ')
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              def sanitize_params
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                # Recursively sanitize all string parameters
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                sanitize_hash(params) if params.present?
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              def sanitize_hash(hash)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                hash.each do |key, value|
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  case value
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  when String
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    # Remove potentially dangerous HTML tags and attributes
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    hash[key] = sanitize_html_input(value)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  when Hash
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    sanitize_hash(value)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  when Array
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    value.map! { |v| v.is_a?(String) ? sanitize_html_input(v) : v }
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              def sanitize_html_input(input)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                return input if input.blank?
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                # Allow basic formatting tags but strip dangerous ones
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                allowed_tags = %w[strong b em i u p br]
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                allowed_attributes = %w[href]
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                # Use Rails sanitize helper with strict whitelist
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                ActionController::Base.helpers.sanitize(
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  input,
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  tags: allowed_tags,
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  attributes: allowed_attributes,
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  remove_contents: %w[script style],
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  whitespace: :remove
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                )
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

              def check_content_type
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                # Ensure JSON requests have proper content type
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                if request.format.json? && request.post?
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  unless request.content_type&.include?('application/json')
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    render json: { error: 'Invalid content type' }, status: :bad_request
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    return false
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

              end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

              # Enhanced parameter validation
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              def validate_required_params(required_keys)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                missing_keys = required_keys.select { |key| params[key].blank? }
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                if missing_keys.any?
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  render json: { 
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    error: 'Missing required parameters', 
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    missing: missing_keys 
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  }, status: :bad_request
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                true
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

              end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              # Secure redirect helper
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              def safe_redirect_to(url_or_path, fallback_path = root_path)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                # Only allow redirects to same origin or relative paths
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                if url_or_path.is_a?(String)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  uri = URI.parse(url_or_path)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  # Check if it's a relative path or same host
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  if uri.relative? || uri.host == request.host
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    redirect_to url_or_path
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  else
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "Blocked redirect to external host: #{uri.host}"
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    redirect_to fallback_path
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                else
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  redirect_to url_or_path
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              rescue URI::InvalidURIError
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.warn "Invalid redirect URL: #{url_or_path}"
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                redirect_to fallback_path
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

              end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              # File upload security
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              def validate_file_upload(file, allowed_types: [], max_size: 10.megabytes)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                return { valid: false, error: 'No file provided' } unless file.present?
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                # Check file size
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                if file.size > max_size
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  return { valid: false, error: 'File size exceeds limit' }
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                # Check file type
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                if allowed_types.any? && !allowed_types.include?(file.content_type)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  return { valid: false, error: 'Invalid file type' }
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                # Check for embedded malicious content
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                if contains_malicious_content?(file)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  return { valid: false, error: 'File contains suspicious content' }
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                { valid: true }
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              def contains_malicious_content?(file)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                # Basic check for executable content in files
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                dangerous_patterns = [
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  /<script/i,
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  /javascript:/i,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  /vbscript:/i,
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  /onload=/i,
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  /onerror=/i,
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  /<iframe/i,
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  /<object/i,
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  /<embed/i
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                ]
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                file.rewind
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                content_sample = file.read(1024) # Read first 1KB
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                file.rewind
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                dangerous_patterns.any? { |pattern| content_sample.match?(pattern) }
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              rescue
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                # If we can't read the file, consider it suspicious
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                true
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

              end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

              # Rate limiting helper
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              def check_rate_limit(key, limit: 60, period: 1.hour)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                cache_key = "rate_limit:#{key}:#{request.remote_ip}"
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                current_requests = Rails.cache.read(cache_key) || 0
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                if current_requests >= limit
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: 'Rate limit exceeded' }, status: :too_many_requests
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                Rails.cache.write(cache_key, current_requests + 1, expires_in: period)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                true
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            end
          
      205.

              def approve_video

              def reject_video
          
      26.

                reason = params[:reason]
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                if @video.reject!(reason)
          
      29.

                  message = "Video rejected"
          
      30.

                  message += " (Reason: #{reason})" if reason.present?
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  redirect_to dashboard_index_path, notice: message
          
      32.

      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  redirect_to dashboard_index_path, alert: "Failed to reject video: #{@video.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"

              def build_job_progress_response

                {

                  pending_count: Video.pending.count,

              def calculate_dashboard_stats
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                Rails.cache.fetch("dashboard_stats", expires_in: 5.minutes) do
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  # Use single queries with GROUP BY for better performance
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  video_counts = Video.group(:status).count
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  sermon_video_counts = Sermon.left_joins(:videos)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                                              .group("CASE WHEN videos.id IS NOT NULL THEN 'with_videos' ELSE 'without_videos' END")
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                                              .count
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  {
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    total_sermons: Sermon.count,
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    sermons_with_videos: sermon_video_counts['with_videos'] || 0,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    sermons_without_videos: sermon_video_counts['without_videos'] || 0,
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    total_videos: Video.count,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    pending_videos: video_counts['pending'] || 0,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    approved_videos: video_counts['approved'] || 0,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    processing_videos: video_counts['processing'] || 0,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    uploaded_videos: video_counts['uploaded'] || 0,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    failed_videos: video_counts['failed'] || 0,
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    videos_with_youtube_links: Video.where.not(youtube_id: [nil, '']).count,
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  }
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              end
          
      81.

            # System Health and Performance Dashboard Controller
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            class MonitoringDashboardController < ApplicationController
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_admin!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_time_range, only: [:index, :performance, :business_metrics]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Main monitoring dashboard
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def index
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @dashboard_data = {
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  system_overview: gather_system_overview,
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  performance_metrics: gather_performance_metrics,
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  business_metrics: gather_business_metrics,
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  recent_alerts: gather_recent_alerts,
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  real_time_status: gather_real_time_status
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  format.html
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  format.json { render json: @dashboard_data }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              # Performance monitoring dashboard
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              def performance
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                @performance_data = {
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  response_times: get_response_time_chart_data,
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  error_rates: get_error_rate_chart_data,
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  throughput: get_throughput_chart_data,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  resource_usage: get_resource_usage_chart_data,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  database_performance: get_database_performance_data,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  cache_performance: get_cache_performance_data
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                }
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  format.html
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  format.json { render json: @performance_data }
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              # Business accuracy dashboard
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              def business_metrics
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                @business_data = {
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  content_extraction: get_content_extraction_metrics,
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  theological_validation: get_theological_validation_metrics,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  video_generation: get_video_generation_metrics,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  content_quality: get_content_quality_metrics,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  user_satisfaction: get_user_satisfaction_metrics,
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  business_kpis: get_business_kpis
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                }
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  format.html

      53.

      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              # Real-time system status
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              def status
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                @status = {
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  system_health: SystemHealthChecker.check_all,
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  business_health: BusinessHealthChecker.check_all,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  active_alerts: Alert.active.limit(10),
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  performance_summary: get_performance_summary,
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  last_updated: Time.current
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                }
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                render json: @status
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              # Alerts management
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              def alerts
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                @alerts = Alert.includes(:alert_type)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                              .order(triggered_at: :desc)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                              .page(params[:page])
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                              .per(25)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                @alert_summary = {
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  total_active: Alert.active.count,
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  critical_count: Alert.active.critical.count,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  high_count: Alert.active.high.count,
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  resolved_today: Alert.resolved.where(resolved_at: Date.current.all_day).count
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                }
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  format.html
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  format.json { render json: { alerts: @alerts, summary: @alert_summary } }
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

              end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              # Export monitoring data
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              def export
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                export_format = params[:format] || 'json'
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                export_type = params[:type] || 'performance'
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                case export_type
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                when 'performance'
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  data = export_performance_data
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                when 'business'
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  data = export_business_data
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                when 'alerts'
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  data = export_alerts_data
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                else
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  data = export_all_data
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                case export_format
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                when 'csv'
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  send_data generate_csv(data), filename: "monitoring_export_#{Date.current}.csv"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                when 'xlsx'
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  send_data generate_xlsx(data), filename: "monitoring_export_#{Date.current}.xlsx"
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                else
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  render json: data
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              private
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              def set_time_range
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                @time_range = case params[:range]
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                              when '1h' then 1.hour
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                              when '6h' then 6.hours
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                              when '24h' then 24.hours
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                              when '7d' then 7.days
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                              when '30d' then 30.days
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                              else 24.hours
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                              end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

              def gather_system_overview
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                {
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  uptime: get_system_uptime,
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  total_requests_today: get_total_requests(Date.current.all_day),
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  error_rate_24h: calculate_error_rate(24.hours),
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  avg_response_time: calculate_avg_response_time(1.hour),
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  active_users: get_active_users_count,
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  processing_queue_size: get_processing_queue_size,
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  system_load: get_system_load,
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  deployment_info: get_deployment_info
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                }
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              def gather_performance_metrics
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                {
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  response_time_p50: get_percentile_response_time(0.5, @time_range),
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  response_time_p95: get_percentile_response_time(0.95, @time_range),
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  response_time_p99: get_percentile_response_time(0.99, @time_range),
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  error_rate: calculate_error_rate(@time_range),
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  throughput: calculate_throughput(@time_range),
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  memory_usage: get_memory_usage_percent,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  cpu_usage: get_cpu_usage_percent,
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  disk_usage: get_disk_usage_percent
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                }
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

              def gather_business_metrics
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                {
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  sermon_processing_accuracy: calculate_sermon_processing_accuracy(@time_range),
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  video_generation_success_rate: calculate_video_generation_success_rate(@time_range),
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  content_quality_score: calculate_content_quality_score(@time_range),
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  theological_validation_accuracy: calculate_theological_validation_accuracy(@time_range),
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  user_satisfaction_score: calculate_user_satisfaction_score(@time_range),
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  sermons_processed_today: Sermon.where(created_at: Date.current.all_day).count,
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  videos_generated_today: Video.where(status: 'uploaded', updated_at: Date.current.all_day).count
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                }
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              def gather_recent_alerts
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                Alert.order(triggered_at: :desc)
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                     .limit(10)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                     .map do |alert|
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  {
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    id: alert.id,
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    type: alert.alert_type,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    severity: alert.severity,
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    message: alert.message,
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    triggered_at: alert.triggered_at,
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    status: alert.status
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  }
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

              
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              def gather_real_time_status
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                {
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  database_status: check_database_status,
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  redis_status: check_redis_status,
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  sidekiq_status: check_sidekiq_status,
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  external_services_status: check_external_services_status,
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  last_deployment: get_last_deployment_info,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  current_version: ENV['APP_VERSION'] || 'unknown'
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                }
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

              
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              def get_response_time_chart_data
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                # Generate time series data for response times
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                end_time = Time.current
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                start_time = end_time - @time_range
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                intervals = generate_time_intervals(start_time, end_time, interval_size(@time_range))
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                intervals.map do |interval_start|
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  interval_end = interval_start + interval_size(@time_range)
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  avg_response_time = calculate_avg_response_time_for_period(interval_start, interval_end)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  {
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    timestamp: interval_start.to_i * 1000, # JavaScript timestamp
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    value: avg_response_time || 0
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  }
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

              end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

              
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

              def get_error_rate_chart_data
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                end_time = Time.current
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                start_time = end_time - @time_range
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                intervals = generate_time_intervals(start_time, end_time, interval_size(@time_range))
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                intervals.map do |interval_start|
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  interval_end = interval_start + interval_size(@time_range)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                  error_rate = calculate_error_rate_for_period(interval_start, interval_end)
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                  
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  {
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                    timestamp: interval_start.to_i * 1000,
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                    value: (error_rate * 100).round(2) # Convert to percentage
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  }
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

              end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

              
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

              def get_throughput_chart_data
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                end_time = Time.current
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                start_time = end_time - @time_range
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                intervals = generate_time_intervals(start_time, end_time, interval_size(@time_range))
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                intervals.map do |interval_start|
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  interval_end = interval_start + interval_size(@time_range)
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  request_count = get_request_count_for_period(interval_start, interval_end)
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  throughput = request_count / (interval_size(@time_range) / 1.minute)
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  {
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                    timestamp: interval_start.to_i * 1000,
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                    value: throughput.round(2)
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                  }
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

              end

              def get_theological_validation_metrics

      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269.

              def interval_size(time_range)
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            

                case time_range
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            

                when 0..1.hour then 1.minute
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            

                when 1.hour..6.hours then 5.minutes
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            

                when 6.hours..24.hours then 15.minutes
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            

                when 24.hours..7.days then 1.hour
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            

                else 1.day
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            

                end
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            

              end
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            

              
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            

              def generate_time_intervals(start_time, end_time, interval)
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            

                intervals = []
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            

                current_time = start_time
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            

                
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            

                while current_time < end_time
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            

            

                  intervals << current_time
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            

            

                  current_time += interval
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            

                end
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            

                
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            

                intervals
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            

              end
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            

              
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            

              def authenticate_admin!
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            

                # Implement admin authentication
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            

                redirect_to root_path unless current_user&.admin?
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            

            

              end
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            

            

              
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            

              # Helper methods for calculating various metrics
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            

            

              def calculate_error_rate(time_range)
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            

                total_requests = get_total_requests(time_range.ago..Time.current)
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_requests == 0
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            

                
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            

                error_requests = get_error_requests(time_range.ago..Time.current)
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            

                (error_requests.to_f / total_requests * 100).round(2)
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            

              end
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            

              
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            

              def calculate_avg_response_time(time_range)
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            

                # Implementation depends on how you store response time logs
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            

                # This is a placeholder implementation
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            

            

                response_times = get_response_times(time_range.ago..Time.current)
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            

            

                return 0 if response_times.empty?
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            

            

                
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            

            

                response_times.sum / response_times.length
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            

            

              end
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            

            

              
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            

            

              def get_performance_summary
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            

            

                {
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            

            

                  status: determine_overall_performance_status,
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            

            

                  response_time: calculate_avg_response_time(5.minutes),
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            

            

                  error_rate: calculate_error_rate(5.minutes),
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            

            

                  throughput: calculate_throughput(5.minutes),
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            

            

                  alerts_count: Alert.active.count
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            

            

                }
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            

            

              end
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            

            

              
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            

            

              def determine_overall_performance_status
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            

            

                error_rate = calculate_error_rate(5.minutes)
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            

            

                avg_response_time = calculate_avg_response_time(5.minutes)
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            

            

                
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            

            

                if error_rate > 5 || avg_response_time > 2000
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            

            

                  'critical'
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            

            

                elsif error_rate > 2 || avg_response_time > 1000
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            

            

                  'warning'
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            

            

                else
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            

            

                  'healthy'
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            

            

                end
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            

            

              end
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            

            

            end
          
      423.

    app/controllers/simple_monitoring_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    50 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 50 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class SimpleMonitoringController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              def index
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                @dashboard_data = {
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  system_overview: {
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                    uptime: "24 hours",
          
      6.

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      4.

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock

            class BulkSermonProcessingJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :heavy_processing
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              retry_on StandardError, wait: :exponentially_longer, attempts: 3
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError

              def perform(church_urls, options = {})
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                batch_size = options[:batch_size] || 50
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                parallel_workers = options[:parallel_workers] || 3
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting bulk sermon processing for #{church_urls.size} churches"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # Process churches in batches to manage memory usage
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                church_urls.each_slice(batch_size) do |church_batch|
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  process_church_batch(church_batch, parallel_workers)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                # Clean up temporary files and refresh dashboard cache
