      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Completed bulk sermon processing"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24.

              private

              def process_church_batch(church_urls, parallel_workers)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                # Use Parallel gem for concurrent processing if available, otherwise sequential
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                if defined?(Parallel)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  Parallel.each(church_urls, in_threads: parallel_workers) do |church_url|
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    process_single_church(church_url)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                else
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  church_urls.each { |church_url| process_single_church(church_url) }
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              def process_single_church(church_url)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                church_name = extract_church_name(church_url)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                config = build_church_config(church_url)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Processing church: #{church_name}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                # Use existing SermonCrawlerService with enhanced error handling
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                service = SermonCrawlerService.new(church_name, config)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                result = service.crawl
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                if result.success?
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Successfully processed #{result.sermons_processed} sermons for #{church_name}"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  # Enqueue video processing for new sermons
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  enqueue_video_processing_for_new_sermons(result.new_sermons)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                else
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to process church #{church_name}: #{result.error}"
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Error processing church #{church_name}: #{e.message}"
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                # Continue processing other churches even if one fails
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              def extract_church_name(church_url)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                URI.parse(church_url).host&.gsub(/^www\./, '')&.split('.')&.first || "unknown_church"
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                "church_#{Digest::MD5.hexdigest(church_url)[0..7]}"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67.

              def build_church_config(church_url)

                  'url' => church_url,

                  'selectors' => {

                    'scripture' => '.scripture, .passage, .verse',

              def enqueue_video_processing_for_new_sermons(new_sermons)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                return if new_sermons.blank?
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                # Create videos for sermons that don't have them
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                sermons_without_videos = new_sermons.select { |sermon| sermon.videos.empty? }
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                sermons_without_videos.each do |sermon|
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  video = Video.create!(
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    sermon: sermon,
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    script: generate_initial_script(sermon),
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    status: 'pending'
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  )
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  # Enqueue individual video processing
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  VideoProcessingJob.perform_later(video.id)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100.

                Rails.logger.info "Enqueued video processing for #{sermons_without_videos.size} new sermons"
          
      102.

              end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104.

              def generate_initial_script(sermon)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                # Generate a basic script template
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                script = []
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                script << "Title: #{sermon.title}" if sermon.title.present?
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                script << "Pastor: #{sermon.pastor}" if sermon.pastor.present?
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                script << "Scripture: #{sermon.scripture}" if sermon.scripture.present?
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                script << ""
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                script << sermon.interpretation.to_s.truncate(4500) if sermon.interpretation.present?
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                script.join("\n")
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              def cleanup_and_refresh_cache
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                # Clear dashboard cache to reflect new data
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                Rails.cache.delete("dashboard_stats")
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                # Clean up any temporary files from processing
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                temp_dirs = Dir.glob(Rails.root.join('tmp', 'sermon_processing_*'))
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                temp_dirs.each do |dir|
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  FileUtils.rm_rf(dir) if File.directory?(dir)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Cleanup completed and cache refreshed"
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            end

    app/jobs/optimized_video_processing_job.rb

            class OptimizedVideoProcessingJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :video_processing
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              retry_on StandardError, wait: :exponentially_longer, attempts: 3
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked, wait: 5.seconds, attempts: 3
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              # Memory-optimized batch processing for videos
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def perform(batch_size = 20, status_filter = 'approved')
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting optimized video processing batch (size: #{batch_size})"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                processed_count = 0
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                failed_count = 0
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                # Use find_each for memory efficiency with large datasets
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                Video.where(status: status_filter)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                     .includes(:sermon) # Eager load to avoid N+1 queries
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                     .find_each(batch_size: batch_size) do |video|
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  result = process_video_with_memory_management(video)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  if result[:success]
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    processed_count += 1
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  else
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    failed_count += 1
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Video processing failed for ID #{video.id}: #{result[:error]}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  # Garbage collect every 10 videos to manage memory
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  GC.start if (processed_count + failed_count) % 10 == 0
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                duration = Time.current - start_time
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Batch processing completed: #{processed_count} processed, #{failed_count} failed in #{duration.round(2)}s"
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                # Clear relevant caches
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                clear_video_caches
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              private
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43.

              def process_video_with_memory_management(video)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                # Create isolated processing environment
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                temp_dir = create_isolated_temp_directory(video.id)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                begin
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  # Update status atomically
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  video.update!(status: 'processing', processing_started_at: Time.current)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  # Use streaming approach for large scripts
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  result = generate_video_with_streaming(video, temp_dir)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  if result[:success]
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    video.update!(
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                      status: 'uploaded',
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                      youtube_id: result[:youtube_id],
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                      video_file_path: result[:video_path],
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                      processing_completed_at: Time.current
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    )
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    { success: true }
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  else
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    video.update!(status: 'failed', error_message: result[:error])
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    { success: false, error: result[:error] }
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  video.update!(status: 'failed', error_message: e.message)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                ensure
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  # Always clean up temporary resources
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72.

      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76.

              def generate_video_with_streaming(video, temp_dir)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                service = VideoGeneratorService.new(video)

    78. 
            

            

                
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                # Configure service for memory-optimized processing
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                service.configure_for_batch_processing(
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  temp_directory: temp_dir,
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82.

      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83.

      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84.

      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85.

      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                result = service.generate
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                if result.success?
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  {
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91.

      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    success: false,
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98.

      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99.

      100.

              def create_isolated_temp_directory(video_id)

              def cleanup_temp_directory(temp_dir)

    110. 
            

            

                return unless temp_dir && Dir.exist?(temp_dir)

    111. 
            

            

                
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                begin
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  FileUtils.rm_rf(temp_dir)

    114. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      115.

              def clear_video_caches

                # Clear dashboard stats cache since video counts changed

                Rails.cache.delete("dashboard_stats")
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                
          
      123.

      126.

              end

            class SermonCrawlingJob < ApplicationJob
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Retry failed jobs with exponential backoff
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              retry_on StandardError, wait: :exponentially_longer, attempts: 3
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              # Discard jobs that fail due to configuration issues
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              discard_on ArgumentError, SermonCrawlerService::ConfigurationError if defined?(SermonCrawlerService::ConfigurationError)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def perform(church_names = nil)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting sermon crawling job at #{start_time}"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                churches_to_crawl = determine_churches_to_crawl(church_names)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                if churches_to_crawl.empty?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "No churches configured for crawling"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  return
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                results = crawl_churches(churches_to_crawl)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                log_crawling_results(results, start_time)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Error in sermon crawling job: #{e.message}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                raise e
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              private
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34.

              def determine_churches_to_crawl(church_names)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                if church_names.present?
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  # Crawl only specified churches
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  Array(church_names).map(&:to_s)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                else
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  # Crawl all configured churches
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  SermonCrawlerService::CHURCH_CONFIGS.keys
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              def crawl_churches(church_names)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                results = {
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  success: [],
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  failed: [],
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  total_sermons: 0,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                church_names.each do |church_name|
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  result = crawl_single_church(church_name)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  if result[:success]
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    results[:success] << church_name
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    results[:total_sermons] += result[:sermons_count]
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  else
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    results[:failed] << { church: church_name, error: result[:error] }
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                results
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              def crawl_single_church(church_name)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                config = SermonCrawlerService::CHURCH_CONFIGS[church_name]
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                unless config
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  return { success: false, error: "No configuration found for #{church_name}" }
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Crawling #{church_name}"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                crawler = SermonCrawlerService.new(church_name, config)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                sermons_count = crawler.crawl
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                { success: true, sermons_count: sermons_count || 0 }
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to crawl #{church_name}: #{e.message}"
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              def log_crawling_results(results, start_time)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                duration = Time.current - start_time
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Completed sermon crawling job in #{duration.round(2)} seconds"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Success: #{results[:success].size} churches"
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Failed: #{results[:failed].size} churches"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Total sermons processed: #{results[:total_sermons]}"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                if results[:failed].any?
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Failed churches: #{results[:failed].map { |f| f[:church] }.join(', ')}"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            end
          
      96.

    app/jobs/video_processing_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    84 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 84 lines missed.

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            class VideoProcessingJob < ApplicationJob
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Retry failed jobs with exponential backoff, but limit attempts for video processing
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              retry_on StandardError, wait: :exponentially_longer, attempts: 2
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              # Discard jobs that fail due to validation or configuration issues
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              discard_on ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound, ArgumentError
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              discard_on VideoGeneratorService::ScriptTooLongError if defined?(VideoGeneratorService::ScriptTooLongError)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              def perform(video_ids = nil, batch_size = 5)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting video processing job at #{start_time}"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                videos_to_process = determine_videos_to_process(video_ids)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                if videos_to_process.empty?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "No videos ready for processing"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  return
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                results = process_videos_in_batches(videos_to_process, batch_size)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                log_processing_results(results, start_time)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              private
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              def determine_videos_to_process(video_ids)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                if video_ids.present?
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # Process specific videos
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  Video.where(id: video_ids).approved
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                else
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  # Process all approved videos that are ready
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  Video.ready_for_processing
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              def process_videos_in_batches(videos, batch_size)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                results = {
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  success: [],
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  failed: [],
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  skipped: [],
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  total_processed: 0,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                videos.find_in_batches(batch_size: batch_size) do |video_batch|
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  video_batch.each do |video|
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    result = process_single_video(video)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    case result[:status]
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    when :success
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                      results[:success] << video.id
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    when :failed
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                      results[:failed] << { id: video.id, error: result[:error] }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    when :skipped
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                      results[:skipped] << { id: video.id, reason: result[:reason] }
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    results[:total_processed] += 1
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                results
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              def process_single_video(video)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                # Double-check the video is still in the right state
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                unless video.can_process?
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  return {
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    status: :skipped,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    reason: "Video #{video.id} is not in processable state (#{video.status})",
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  }
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Processing video #{video.id} for sermon '#{video.sermon.title}'"
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                generator = VideoGeneratorService.new(video)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                generator.generate
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Successfully processed video #{video.id}"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                { status: :success }
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

              rescue VideoGeneratorService::VideoGenerationError => e
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Video generation failed for video #{video.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                video.mark_failed!(e.message)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                { status: :failed, error: e.message }
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Unexpected error processing video #{video.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                video.mark_failed!("Unexpected error: #{e.message}")
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                { status: :failed, error: e.message }
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

              def log_processing_results(results, start_time)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                duration = Time.current - start_time
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Completed video processing job in #{duration.round(2)} seconds"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Total processed: #{results[:total_processed]}"
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Successful: #{results[:success].size}"
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Failed: #{results[:failed].size}"
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Skipped: #{results[:skipped].size}"
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                if results[:failed].any?
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Failed video IDs: #{results[:failed].map { |f| f[:id] }.join(', ')}"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                if results[:skipped].any?
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Skipped video IDs: #{results[:skipped].map { |s| s[:id] }.join(', ')}"
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            end
          
      115.

            class AuditLog < ApplicationRecord

              # Polymorphic association to any auditable model

              belongs_to :auditable, polymorphic: true, optional: true
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              
          
      5.

              # JSON serialization for audit data

              validates :action, presence: true

              # Scopes for querying

              scope :recent, -> { order(created_at: :desc) }

              def self.compliance_summary(days_back: 30)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                end_date = Time.current
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                start_date = days_back.days.ago
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                {
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  period: "#{start_date.to_date} to #{end_date.to_date}",
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  total_events: in_date_range(start_date, end_date).count,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  events_by_action: in_date_range(start_date, end_date).group(:action).count,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  events_by_model: in_date_range(start_date, end_date).group(:auditable_type).count,

    32.

    33. 
            

            

                }

    34. 
            

            

              end
          
      35.

      36.

              def self.security_events(days_back: 7)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                security_actions = %w[sensitive_access sensitive_change failed_login data_export]
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                in_date_range(days_back.days.ago, Time.current)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  .where(action: security_actions)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  .order(created_at: :desc)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              private
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              def self.daily_activity_summary(start_date, end_date)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                in_date_range(start_date, end_date)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  .group("DATE(created_at)")
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  .group(:action)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  .count
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            end

            class BusinessActivityLog < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Serialization for context data
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              serialize :context, JSON
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # Validations
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              validates :activity_type, presence: true
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              validates :performed_at, presence: true
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8.

    9. 
            

            

              # Scopes for querying

              scope :recent, -> { order(performed_at: :desc) }

              scope :for_entity, ->(type, id) { where(entity_type: type, entity_id: id) }

    12. 
            

            

              scope :for_user, ->(user_id) { where(user_id: user_id) }

              scope :business_metrics, -> { where(activity_type: 'business_metric') }

              scope :performance_metrics, -> { where(activity_type: 'performance_metric') }

              scope :integration_events, -> { where(activity_type: 'integration_event') }

              # Activity type constants
          
      24.

              ACTIVITY_TYPES = %w[
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                business_operation
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                user_interaction  
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                data_access
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                state_transition
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                business_metric
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                performance_metric
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                integration_event
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                business_rule
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              ].freeze
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              validates :activity_type, inclusion: { in: ACTIVITY_TYPES }
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              # Business intelligence and reporting methods

              def self.activity_summary(period = 1.day)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                start_time = period.ago
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                {
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  period: "#{start_time.to_date} to #{Date.current}",
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  total_activities: in_time_range(start_time, Time.current).count,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  by_type: in_time_range(start_time, Time.current).group(:activity_type).count,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  by_entity: in_time_range(start_time, Time.current).group(:entity_type).count,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  unique_users: in_time_range(start_time, Time.current).distinct.count(:user_id),
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  hourly_distribution: hourly_activity_distribution(start_time, Time.current)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                }
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              
          
      51.

              def self.business_performance_metrics(period = 1.day)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                start_time = period.ago
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                performance_logs = performance_metrics.in_time_range(start_time, Time.current)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                {
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  slow_operations: performance_logs.where("context LIKE ?", "%slow_operation%").count,
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  average_response_time: calculate_average_response_time(performance_logs),
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  peak_activity_hour: find_peak_activity_hour(start_time, Time.current),
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  error_rate: calculate_error_rate(start_time, Time.current)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                }
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63.

              def self.compliance_audit_trail(entity_type, entity_id, days_back = 90)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                start_time = days_back.days.ago
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                activities = for_entity(entity_type, entity_id)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                             .in_time_range(start_time, Time.current)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                             .order(:performed_at)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                {
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  entity: "#{entity_type}:#{entity_id}",
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  audit_period: "#{start_time.to_date} to #{Date.current}",
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  total_activities: activities.count,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  data_access_events: activities.data_access.count,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  state_changes: activities.state_transitions.count,
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  user_interactions: activities.user_interactions.count,
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  sensitive_data_access: count_sensitive_data_access(activities),
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  timeline: activities.map(&:compliance_summary)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                }
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              def self.user_activity_profile(user_id, period = 30.days)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                start_time = period.ago
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                user_activities = for_user(user_id).in_time_range(start_time, Time.current)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                {
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  user_id: user_id,
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  period: "#{start_time.to_date} to #{Date.current}",
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  total_activities: user_activities.count,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  activity_breakdown: user_activities.group(:activity_type).count,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  entities_accessed: user_activities.group(:entity_type).count,
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93.

      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94.

      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                }
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97.
