              def self.security_events(period = 7.days)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                start_time = period.ago
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                suspicious_activities = in_time_range(start_time, Time.current)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                                       .where("context LIKE ? OR context LIKE ? OR context LIKE ?", 
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                                              "%sensitive_data%", "%error%", "%failed%")
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                {
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  period: "#{start_time.to_date} to #{Date.current}",
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  total_security_events: suspicious_activities.count,
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  sensitive_data_access: suspicious_activities.data_access.count,
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  failed_operations: count_failed_operations(suspicious_activities),
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  unusual_patterns: detect_unusual_patterns(start_time, Time.current)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                }
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              def compliance_summary
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                {
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  timestamp: performed_at.iso8601,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  activity: activity_type,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  entity: "#{entity_type}:#{entity_id}",
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  user: user_id,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  operation: operation_name,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  sensitive_data_involved: sensitive_data_involved?,
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  compliance_relevant: compliance_relevant?
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                }
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              def sensitive_data_involved?
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                return false unless context.is_a?(Hash)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                context['sensitive_data'] == true ||
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  context['fields_accessed']&.any? { |field| sensitive_field?(field) }
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

              def compliance_relevant?
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                return true if sensitive_data_involved?
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                return true if %w[data_access state_transition].include?(activity_type)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                return true if context.is_a?(Hash) && context['compliance_flag'] == true
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                false
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              private
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              def self.hourly_activity_distribution(start_time, end_time)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                in_time_range(start_time, end_time)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  .group("EXTRACT(hour FROM performed_at)")
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  .count
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  .transform_keys { |hour| "#{hour}:00" }
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

              end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

              
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

              def self.calculate_average_response_time(performance_logs)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                durations = performance_logs.where("context LIKE ?", "%duration_ms%")
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                                           .filter_map do |log|
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                                             log.context.dig('duration_ms') if log.context.is_a?(Hash)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                                           end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                durations.any? ? (durations.sum / durations.size).round(2) : 0
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

              end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

              
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

              def self.find_peak_activity_hour(start_time, end_time)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                hourly_dist = hourly_activity_distribution(start_time, end_time)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                hourly_dist.max_by { |_, count| count }&.first || "N/A"
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              def self.calculate_error_rate(start_time, end_time)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                total_ops = business_operations.in_time_range(start_time, end_time).count
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                error_ops = business_operations.in_time_range(start_time, end_time)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                                              .where("context LIKE ?", "%error%").count
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_ops == 0
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                ((error_ops.to_f / total_ops) * 100).round(2)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

              
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              def self.count_sensitive_data_access(activities)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                activities.select(&:sensitive_data_involved?).count
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

              end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

              
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              def self.daily_activity_pattern(user_activities)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                user_activities.group("DATE(performed_at)").count
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

              
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              def self.identify_compliance_concerns(user_activities)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                concerns = []
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                # High volume of sensitive data access
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                sensitive_access_count = user_activities.select(&:sensitive_data_involved?).count
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                if sensitive_access_count > 50
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  concerns << "high_volume_sensitive_access"
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                # Unusual activity patterns
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                daily_counts = daily_activity_pattern(user_activities).values
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                if daily_counts.any? { |count| count > daily_counts.sum / daily_counts.size * 3 }
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  concerns << "unusual_activity_spike"
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                concerns
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              def self.count_failed_operations(activities)
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                activities.business_operations
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                          .where("context LIKE ?", "%status\":\"error%")
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                          .count
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

              
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

              def self.detect_unusual_patterns(start_time, end_time)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                patterns = []
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                # Detect unusual time patterns
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                hourly_dist = hourly_activity_distribution(start_time, end_time)
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                night_activity = (0..5).sum { |hour| hourly_dist["#{hour}:00"] || 0 }
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                total_activity = hourly_dist.values.sum
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                if total_activity > 0 && (night_activity.to_f / total_activity) > 0.2
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  patterns << "unusual_night_activity"
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                # Detect bulk operations
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                bulk_operations = in_time_range(start_time, end_time)
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                                 .group(:user_id)
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                                 .having("COUNT(*) > ?", 1000)
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                                 .count
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                if bulk_operations.any?
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  patterns << "bulk_operations_detected"
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                patterns
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

              end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

              
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

              def sensitive_field?(field_name)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                sensitive_fields = %w[email phone_number personal_notes password encrypted_]
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                sensitive_fields.any? { |sf| field_name.to_s.include?(sf) }
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

              end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

            end
          
      235.

    app/models/concerns/audit_logging_concern.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    195 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 195 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # Concern for comprehensive audit logging and compliance tracking
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            module AuditLoggingConcern
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              extend ActiveSupport::Concern
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              included do
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # Track changes for compliance
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                has_paper_trail if defined?(PaperTrail)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Audit log callbacks
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                after_create :log_creation_audit
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                after_update :log_update_audit
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                after_destroy :log_destruction_audit
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # Sensitive operation tracking
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                after_update :log_sensitive_changes, if: :sensitive_attributes_changed?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              class_methods do
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                def audit_trail_for(record_id, days_back: 90)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  # Get audit trail for a specific record
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  versions = if defined?(PaperTrail)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                               PaperTrail::Version.where(
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                                 item_type: name,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                                 item_id: record_id,
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                                 created_at: days_back.days.ago..Time.current
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                               ).order(:created_at)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                             else
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                               []
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                             end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  {
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    record_type: name,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    record_id: record_id,
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    versions: versions.map(&:serialize_for_audit),
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    generated_at: Time.current.iso8601
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  }
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                def compliance_report(start_date, end_date)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  # Generate compliance report for date range
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  {
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    period: "#{start_date} to #{end_date}",
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    total_records: where(created_at: start_date..end_date).count,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    modifications: audit_modifications_count(start_date, end_date),
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    data_exports: audit_data_exports(start_date, end_date),
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    anonymizations: audit_anonymizations(start_date, end_date),
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    deletions: audit_deletions(start_date, end_date),
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    generated_at: Time.current.iso8601
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                private
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                def audit_modifications_count(start_date, end_date)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  return 0 unless defined?(PaperTrail)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  PaperTrail::Version.where(
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    item_type: name,
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    event: 'update',
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    created_at: start_date..end_date
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  ).count
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                def audit_data_exports(start_date, end_date)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  AuditLog.where(
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    auditable_type: name,
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    action: 'data_export',
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    created_at: start_date..end_date
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  ).count
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                rescue NameError
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  0 # AuditLog model doesn't exist yet
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                def audit_anonymizations(start_date, end_date)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  where(
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    anonymized_at: start_date..end_date
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  ).count
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                rescue NoMethodError
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  0 # anonymized_at field doesn't exist
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                def audit_deletions(start_date, end_date)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  return 0 unless defined?(PaperTrail)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  PaperTrail::Version.where(
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    item_type: name,
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    event: 'destroy',
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    created_at: start_date..end_date
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  ).count
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              # Instance methods for audit logging
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              def log_sensitive_access(accessor_id, access_type, context = {})
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                audit_data = {
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  record_type: self.class.name,
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  record_id: id,
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  accessor_id: accessor_id,
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  access_type: access_type,
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  context: context,
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  timestamp: Time.current.iso8601,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  ip_address: context[:ip_address],
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  user_agent: context[:user_agent]
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                }
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "AUDIT: Sensitive data access - #{audit_data.to_json}"
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                # Store in audit log table if available
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                create_audit_log_entry('sensitive_access', audit_data)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

              end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              def log_data_export(requester_id, export_type, context = {})
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                audit_data = {
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  record_type: self.class.name,
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  record_id: id,
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  requester_id: requester_id,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  export_type: export_type,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  context: context,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  timestamp: Time.current.iso8601
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                }
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "AUDIT: Data export - #{audit_data.to_json}"
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                create_audit_log_entry('data_export', audit_data)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              def log_anonymization(requester_id, reason, context = {})
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                audit_data = {
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  record_type: self.class.name,
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  record_id: id,
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  requester_id: requester_id,
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  reason: reason,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  context: context,
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  timestamp: Time.current.iso8601
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                }
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "AUDIT: Data anonymization - #{audit_data.to_json}"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                create_audit_log_entry('anonymization', audit_data)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              private
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              def log_creation_audit
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                audit_data = {
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  action: 'create',
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  record_type: self.class.name,
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  record_id: id,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  timestamp: Time.current.iso8601,
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  changes: attributes
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                }
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "AUDIT: Record creation - #{audit_data.to_json}"
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                create_audit_log_entry('create', audit_data)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

              def log_update_audit
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                return unless saved_changes.any?
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                # Filter out sensitive attributes from logs
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                safe_changes = saved_changes.except(
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  'encrypted_email', 
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  'encrypted_phone_number', 
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  'encrypted_personal_notes',
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  'password_digest'
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                )
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                audit_data = {
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  action: 'update',
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  record_type: self.class.name,
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  record_id: id,
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  timestamp: Time.current.iso8601,
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  changes: safe_changes
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                }
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "AUDIT: Record update - #{audit_data.to_json}"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                create_audit_log_entry('update', audit_data)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

              end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

              def log_destruction_audit
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                audit_data = {
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  action: 'destroy',
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  record_type: self.class.name,
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  record_id: id,
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  timestamp: Time.current.iso8601,
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  final_attributes: attributes.except(
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                    'encrypted_email', 
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                    'encrypted_phone_number', 
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    'encrypted_personal_notes'
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  )
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                }
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "AUDIT: Record destruction - #{audit_data.to_json}"
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                create_audit_log_entry('destroy', audit_data)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              def log_sensitive_changes
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                sensitive_changes = saved_changes.select do |attr, _|
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  sensitive_attributes.include?(attr.to_s)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                return if sensitive_changes.empty?
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                audit_data = {
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  action: 'sensitive_data_change',
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  record_type: self.class.name,
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  record_id: id,
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  timestamp: Time.current.iso8601,
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  changed_attributes: sensitive_changes.keys,
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  change_count: sensitive_changes.size
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                }
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.warn "AUDIT: Sensitive data change - #{audit_data.to_json}"
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                create_audit_log_entry('sensitive_change', audit_data)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              def sensitive_attributes_changed?
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                (saved_changes.keys & sensitive_attributes).any?
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

              end
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

            
          
      219.

              def create_audit_log_entry(action, data)
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                # Create audit log entry if AuditLog model exists
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                return unless defined?(AuditLog)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                AuditLog.create!(
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  auditable_type: self.class.name,
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  auditable_id: id,
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  action: action,
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  audit_data: data,
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  created_at: Time.current
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                )
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to create audit log entry: #{e.message}"
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

              end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

            end

                def log_business_metric(metric_name, value, context = {})
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  BusinessActivityLog.create!(
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    activity_type: 'business_metric',
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    entity_type: name,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    entity_id: nil,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    metric_name: metric_name,
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22.

      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    context: context,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    performed_at: Time.current
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  )
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

                def business_activity_summary(period = 1.day)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  start_time = period.ago
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  BusinessActivityLog.where(
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    entity_type: name,
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    performed_at: start_time..Time.current
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  ).group(:activity_type).count
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                end

              end

              def log_business_operation(operation_name, context = {})
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                result = nil
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                error = nil
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                begin
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  result = yield if block_given?
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  BusinessActivityLog.create!(
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    activity_type: 'business_operation',
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    entity_type: self.class.name,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    entity_id: id,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    operation_name: operation_name,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    context: context.merge(
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                      duration_ms: ((Time.current - start_time) * 1000).round(2),
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                      status: 'success'
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    ),
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    performed_at: start_time
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  )
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "BUSINESS_OPERATION: #{operation_name} completed successfully for #{self.class.name}:#{id}"
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  result
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  error = e
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  BusinessActivityLog.create!(
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    activity_type: 'business_operation',
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    entity_type: self.class.name,
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    entity_id: id,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    operation_name: operation_name,
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    context: context.merge(
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                      duration_ms: ((Time.current - start_time) * 1000).round(2),
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      status: 'error',
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                      error_message: e.message,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                      error_class: e.class.name
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    ),
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    performed_at: start_time
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  )
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "BUSINESS_OPERATION: #{operation_name} failed for #{self.class.name}:#{id} - #{e.message}"
          
      81.

      82.

              def log_data_access(accessor_id, access_type, fields_accessed = [], context = {})
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                # Track sensitive data access for compliance
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                BusinessActivityLog.create!(
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  activity_type: 'data_access',
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  entity_type: self.class.name,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  entity_id: id,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  user_id: accessor_id,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  context: context.merge(
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    access_type: access_type, # read, write, delete, export
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                    fields_accessed: fields_accessed,
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    sensitive_data: contains_sensitive_data?(fields_accessed),
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    compliance_flag: compliance_required?(access_type, fields_accessed)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  ),
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  performed_at: Time.current
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                )
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                if contains_sensitive_data?(fields_accessed)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "SENSITIVE_DATA_ACCESS: User #{accessor_id} accessed sensitive fields #{fields_accessed} on #{self.class.name}:#{id}"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139.

              def log_integration_event(integration_name, event_type, context = {})

    160.

    161. 
            

            

                  entity_id: id,
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  context: context.merge(
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    integration_name: integration_name,
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                    event_type: event_type, # api_call, webhook, file_transfer, etc.
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    external_id: context[:external_id],
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166.

                Rails.logger.info "INTEGRATION_EVENT: #{integration_name} #{event_type} for #{self.class.name}:#{id}"
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174.

              private
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              def log_business_activity_creation
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                log_business_operation('create', {
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  attributes: business_relevant_attributes,
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  created_by: current_user_id_for_logging,
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  source: activity_source_context
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                })
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

              def log_business_activity_update
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                return unless business_relevant_changes?
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                log_business_operation('update', {
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  changes: business_relevant_changes,
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  updated_by: current_user_id_for_logging,
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191.

      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                })
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              def log_business_activity_deletion
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                log_business_operation('delete', {

                  final_attributes: business_relevant_attributes,

      202.

              def business_relevant_attributes
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                # Filter out system attributes, focus on business data
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                attributes.except(
          
      206.

                  'id', 'created_at', 'updated_at',

              def business_relevant_changes
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                return {} unless respond_to?(:saved_changes)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                saved_changes.except(
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  'updated_at', 'encrypted_email', 'encrypted_phone_number'
          
      216.

                ).select { |attr, _| business_critical_field?(attr) }
          
      217.

      218.

              def business_relevant_changes?

              def business_critical_field?(field_name)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                # Define which fields are business-critical for logging
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                business_fields = %w[
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                  title status scripture pastor church denomination
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  interpretation action_points audience_count
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                  video_path youtube_id script processing_started_at
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                ]
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                business_fields.include?(field_name.to_s)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

              end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

            
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

              def contains_sensitive_data?(fields)
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                sensitive_fields = %w[email phone_number personal_notes password]
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                (fields.map(&:to_s) & sensitive_fields).any?
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

              end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

              def compliance_required?(access_type, fields)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                # Determine if this access requires compliance logging
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                sensitive_access = contains_sensitive_data?(fields)
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                destructive_operation = %w[delete export anonymize].include?(access_type.to_s)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                sensitive_access || destructive_operation
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

              end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

              def current_user_id_for_logging
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                # Try to get current user from various contexts
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                if defined?(Current) && Current.respond_to?(:user)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  Current.user&.id
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                elsif Thread.current[:current_user]
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                  Thread.current[:current_user]&.id
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                else
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                  'system'
