              def self.calculate_failure_rate(start_time)
          
      708. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    708. 
            

            

                total = where(created_at: start_time..Time.current).where.not(status: 'pending').count
          
      709. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    709. 
            

            

                return 0 if total == 0
          
      710. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    710. 
            

            

                
          
      711. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    711. 
            

            

                failed = where(status: 'failed', created_at: start_time..Time.current).count
          
      712. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    712. 
            

            

                (failed.to_f / total * 100).round(2)
          
      713. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    713. 
            

            

              end
          
      714. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    714. 
            

            

              
          
      715. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    715. 
            

            

              def self.categorize_failures(failed_videos)
          
      716. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    716. 
            

            

                categories = Hash.new(0)
          
      717. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    717. 
            

            

                
          
      718. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    718. 
            

            

                failed_videos.pluck(:error_message).compact.each do |error|
          
      719. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    719. 
            

            

                  category = case error
          
      720. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    720. 
            

            

                             when /timeout/ then 'timeout'
          
      721. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    721. 
            

            

                             when /memory/ then 'memory'
          
      722. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    722. 
            

            

                             when /network/ then 'network'
          
      723. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    723. 
            

            

                             when /validation/ then 'validation'
          
      724. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    724. 
            

            

                             else 'unknown'
          
      725. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    725. 
            

            

                             end
          
      726. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    726. 
            

            

                  categories[category] += 1
          
      727. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    727. 
            

            

                end
          
      728. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    728. 
            

            

                
          
      729. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    729. 
            

            

                categories
          
      730. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    730. 
            

            

              end
          
      731. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    731. 
            

            

              
          
      732. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    732. 
            

            

              def self.analyze_retry_patterns(failed_videos)
          
      733. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    733. 
            

            

                retry_counts = failed_videos.pluck(:retry_count).compact
          
      734. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    734. 
            

            

                
          
      735. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    735. 
            

            

                {
          
      736. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    736. 
            

            

                  videos_with_retries: retry_counts.count { |count| count > 0 },
          
      737. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    737. 
            

            

                  average_retry_count: retry_counts.any? ? (retry_counts.sum.to_f / retry_counts.length).round(2) : 0,
          
      738. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    738. 
            

            

                  max_retries_reached: retry_counts.count { |count| count >= 3 }
          
      739. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    739. 
            

            

                }
          
      740. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    740. 
            

            

              end
          
      741. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    741. 
            

            

            end
          
      742.

            class Sermon < ApplicationRecord

              # Scopes
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              scope :recent, -> { order(created_at: :desc) }
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              scope :by_date, -> { order(sermon_date: :desc) }

    50. 
            

            

              scope :by_church, ->(church_name) { where(church: church_name) }

              scope :by_denomination, ->(denomination) { where(denomination: denomination) }

              scope :with_videos, -> { joins(:videos) }
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              scope :without_videos, -> { left_joins(:videos).where(videos: { id: nil }) }

              # Class methods

              def self.search(query)

                return none if query.blank?

                # Cache search results for common queries
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                cache_key = "sermon_search_#{Digest::MD5.hexdigest(query.to_s.downcase)}"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                Rails.cache.fetch(cache_key, expires_in: 10.minutes) do
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  sanitized_query = "%#{sanitize_sql_like(query)}%"
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  # Optimize search with better indexing utilization
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  results = where(
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    "title ILIKE ? OR scripture ILIKE ? OR pastor ILIKE ? OR interpretation ILIKE ?",
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    sanitized_query, sanitized_query, sanitized_query, sanitized_query
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  )
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  # Convert to array to cache the actual results
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  results.includes(:videos).to_a
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              def self.recent_sermons(limit = 10)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                cache_key = "recent_sermons_#{limit}"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                Rails.cache.fetch(cache_key, expires_in: 5.minutes) do
          
      85.

      86.

              def self.cached_counts

      92.

                  {

              def display_title

              def short_description
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                return scripture if scripture.present?
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                return interpretation.truncate(100) if interpretation.present?
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                "Sermon by #{pastor}" if pastor.present?

    131. 
            

            

              end
          
      132.

              private

              def normalize_fields
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                self.title = title&.strip
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137.

    139.

      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                self.scripture = scripture&.strip

    141. 
            

            

                self.interpretation = interpretation&.strip
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                self.action_points = action_points&.strip
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144.

              def log_creation

      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              end
          
      148.

            end

            class Video < ApplicationRecord
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              include BusinessActivityLogging
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              include AuditLoggingConcern
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              include SensitiveDataConcern
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              include VideoBusinessLogic
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              # Associations
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              belongs_to :sermon
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              # Enhanced business parameter validations
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              validates :script, presence: true, length: { minimum: 10, maximum: 10_000 },
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                        security: { type: :content },
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                        business_parameter: { parameter_type: :video_script }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                        
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              validates :status, presence: true, inclusion: { in: %w[pending approved processing uploaded failed] },
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                        business_parameter: { parameter_type: :moderation_status }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              validates :youtube_id, uniqueness: true, allow_nil: true
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              validates :video_path, length: { maximum: 500 }
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              validates :thumbnail_path, length: { maximum: 500 }
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              # Define status as a string enum
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              enum :status, {
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                pending: "pending",
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                approved: "approved",
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                processing: "processing",
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28.

    29.

              }, default: "pending"
          
      31.

              # Scopes

    33. 
            

            

              scope :recent, -> { order(created_at: :desc) }
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              scope :with_youtube_id, -> { where.not(youtube_id: nil) }
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              scope :without_youtube_id, -> { where(youtube_id: nil) }
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              scope :ready_for_processing, -> { approved.where(video_path: nil) }
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              scope :ready_for_upload, -> { processing.where.not(video_path: nil) }
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38.

              def self.cached_status_counts

              def can_reject?

              def can_upload?

              def approve!

              def has_video_file?

              def display_file_size

      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                file_size_mb = file_size / 1_048_576.0 # Convert to MB
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                "#{file_size_mb.round(2)} MB"
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              def processing_time
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                return nil unless uploaded?
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                updated_at - created_at
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              def display_status
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                status.humanize
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

              end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

              def status_badge_class
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                case status
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                when "pending" then "badge-warning"
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                when "approved" then "badge-info"
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                when "processing" then "badge-primary"
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                when "uploaded" then "badge-success"
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                when "failed" then "badge-danger"
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                else "badge-secondary"
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

              end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              def can_be_deleted?
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                failed? || (uploaded? && youtube_id.present?)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              private
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              def sanitize_script
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                return if script.blank?
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                # Remove potentially dangerous HTML/script tags
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                self.script = ActionController::Base.helpers.strip_tags(script)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                # Normalize whitespace
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                self.script = script.gsub(/\s+/, " ").strip
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

              end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

              def log_status_change
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                old_status = saved_changes["status"][0]
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                new_status = saved_changes["status"][1]
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Video #{id} status changed from #{old_status} to #{new_status}"
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

              def cleanup_files
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                cleanup_video_file
          
      187.

                cleanup_thumbnail_file
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              def cleanup_video_file
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                return unless video_path.present? && File.exist?(video_path)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                File.delete(video_path)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Deleted video file: #{video_path}"
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to delete video file #{video_path}: #{e.message}"
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            
          
      199.

              def cleanup_thumbnail_file
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                return unless thumbnail_path.present? && File.exist?(thumbnail_path)
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                File.delete(thumbnail_path)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Deleted thumbnail file: #{thumbnail_path}"
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to delete thumbnail file #{thumbnail_path}: #{e.message}"
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

              end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

            end
          
      208.

    app/services/bulk_sermon_import_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    170 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 170 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # Optimized bulk import service for large sermon datasets
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            class BulkSermonImportService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              include ActiveModel::Validations
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              attr_reader :import_stats, :errors
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def initialize(options = {})
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @batch_size = options[:batch_size] || 1000
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @chunk_size = options[:chunk_size] || 100
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @parallel_workers = options[:parallel_workers] || 4
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                @import_stats = { created: 0, updated: 0, failed: 0, total: 0 }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                @errors = []
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              # Bulk import from CSV file
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              def import_from_csv(file_path)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                validate_csv_file(file_path)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                return false unless errors.empty?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting bulk CSV import from #{file_path}"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                CSV.foreach(file_path, headers: true, chunk_size: @chunk_size) do |chunk|
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  process_csv_chunk(chunk)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                duration = Time.current - start_time
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "CSV import completed in #{duration.round(2)}s: #{@import_stats}"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                clear_all_caches
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                true
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "CSV import failed: #{e.message}"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                @errors << "Import failed: #{e.message}"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                false
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              # Bulk import from array of sermon hashes
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              def import_from_array(sermons_data)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                return false if sermons_data.empty?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting bulk array import for #{sermons_data.size} sermons"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                @import_stats[:total] = sermons_data.size
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                # Process in chunks for memory efficiency
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                sermons_data.each_slice(@chunk_size) do |chunk|
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  process_sermon_chunk(chunk)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                duration = Time.current - start_time
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Array import completed in #{duration.round(2)}s: #{@import_stats}"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                clear_all_caches
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                true
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Array import failed: #{e.message}"
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                @errors << "Import failed: #{e.message}"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                false
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              # Bulk upsert using Rails 6+ upsert_all
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              def bulk_upsert(sermons_data)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                return false if sermons_data.empty?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting bulk upsert for #{sermons_data.size} sermons"
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                # Prepare data for upsert
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                upsert_data = prepare_upsert_data(sermons_data)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                # Perform bulk upsert in batches
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                upsert_data.each_slice(@batch_size) do |batch|
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  perform_bulk_upsert_batch(batch)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                duration = Time.current - start_time
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Bulk upsert completed in #{duration.round(2)}s: #{@import_stats}"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                clear_all_caches
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                true
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Bulk upsert failed: #{e.message}"
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                @errors << "Bulk upsert failed: #{e.message}"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                false
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              private
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              def validate_csv_file(file_path)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                unless File.exist?(file_path)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  @errors << "CSV file not found: #{file_path}"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  return
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                unless File.readable?(file_path)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  @errors << "CSV file not readable: #{file_path}"
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  return
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                # Validate CSV headers
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                begin
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  headers = CSV.read(file_path, headers: true).headers
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  required_headers = %w[title source_url church]
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  missing_headers = required_headers - headers
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  if missing_headers.any?
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    @errors << "Missing required CSV headers: #{missing_headers.join(', ')}"
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  @errors << "Invalid CSV file: #{e.message}"
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              def process_csv_chunk(chunk)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                sermon_data = chunk.map do |row|
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  {
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    title: row['title']&.strip,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    source_url: row['source_url']&.strip,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    church: row['church']&.strip,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    pastor: row['pastor']&.strip,
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    scripture: row['scripture']&.strip,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    interpretation: row['interpretation']&.strip,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    denomination: row['denomination']&.strip,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    audience_count: row['audience_count']&.to_i
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  }.compact_blank
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                process_sermon_chunk(sermon_data)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

              end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              def process_sermon_chunk(sermon_data)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                # Filter out invalid records
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                valid_data = sermon_data.select { |data| valid_sermon_data?(data) }
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                if valid_data.size != sermon_data.size
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  @import_stats[:failed] += (sermon_data.size - valid_data.size)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                return if valid_data.empty?
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                # Use transaction for chunk
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                Sermon.transaction do
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  valid_data.each do |data|
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    process_single_sermon(data)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Chunk processing failed: #{e.message}"
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                @import_stats[:failed] += sermon_data.size
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

              end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              def process_single_sermon(sermon_data)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                sermon = Sermon.find_or_initialize_by(source_url: sermon_data[:source_url])
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                if sermon.persisted?
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  # Update existing sermon
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  sermon.assign_attributes(sermon_data.except(:source_url))
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  if sermon.changed? && sermon.save
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    @import_stats[:updated] += 1
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                else
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  # Create new sermon
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  sermon.assign_attributes(sermon_data)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  if sermon.save
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                    @import_stats[:created] += 1
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  else
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                    @import_stats[:failed] += 1
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "Failed to save sermon: #{sermon.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                @import_stats[:failed] += 1
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Error processing sermon: #{e.message}"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

              end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              def prepare_upsert_data(sermons_data)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                timestamp = Time.current
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                sermons_data.map do |data|
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  data.merge(
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                    created_at: timestamp,
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                    updated_at: timestamp
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  ).stringify_keys
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              def perform_bulk_upsert_batch(batch)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                result = Sermon.upsert_all(
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  batch,
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  unique_by: :source_url,
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  update_only: [:title, :pastor, :scripture, :interpretation, :church, :denomination, :audience_count, :updated_at]
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                )
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                @import_stats[:created] += result
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                @import_stats[:failed] += batch.size
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Bulk upsert batch failed: #{e.message}"
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              def valid_sermon_data?(data)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                return false if data[:title].blank?
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                return false if data[:source_url].blank?
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                return false if data[:church].blank?
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                # Validate URL format
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                begin
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  URI.parse(data[:source_url])
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                rescue URI::InvalidURIError
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                end
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                true
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

              end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

              def clear_all_caches
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                Rails.cache.delete("sermon_counts")
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                Rails.cache.delete("dashboard_stats")
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                Rails.cache.delete_matched("recent_sermons_*")
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                Rails.cache.delete_matched("sermon_search_*")
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

              end
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

            end
          
      223.

    app/services/bulk_video_operations_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    222 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 222 lines missed.
