              }.freeze
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              # Network timeout constants
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              CONNECTION_TIMEOUT = 10
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              READ_TIMEOUT = 30
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              class << self
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                def crawl_all
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  CHURCH_CONFIGS.each do |church_name, config|
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    new(church_name, config).crawl
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              def initialize(church_name, config)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                @church_name = church_name
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                @config = config
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              def crawl
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting crawl for #{@church_name}"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                doc = fetch_page(@config[:url])
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                return unless doc
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                sermons = parse_sermons(doc)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                save_sermons(sermons)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Completed crawl for #{@church_name}: #{sermons.size} sermons processed"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Error crawling #{@church_name}: #{e.message}"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              private
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              def fetch_page(url)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                validate_url!(url)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                uri = URI.parse(url)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                http.use_ssl = uri.scheme == "https"
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                http.open_timeout = CONNECTION_TIMEOUT
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                http.read_timeout = READ_TIMEOUT
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(uri.request_uri)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                request["User-Agent"] = "SermonCrawler/1.0"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                response = http.request(request)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                unless response.is_a?(Net::HTTPSuccess)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "HTTP error for #{url}: #{response.code} #{response.message}"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  return nil
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                Nokogiri::HTML(response.body)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to fetch #{url}: #{e.message}"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                nil
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              def validate_url!(url)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                uri = URI.parse(url)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                unless %w[http https].include?(uri.scheme)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Invalid URL scheme: #{uri.scheme}"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                unless uri.host
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "URL must have a host"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                # Prevent SSRF attacks by blocking internal networks
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                if uri.host.match?(/\A(127\.|10\.|172\.(1[6-9]|2\d|3[01])\.|192\.168\.)/)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Access to private networks is not allowed"
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

              def parse_sermons(doc)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                sermon_elements = doc.css(".sermon-item")
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                return [] if sermon_elements.empty?
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                sermon_elements.filter_map do |sermon_element|
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  build_sermon_data(sermon_element)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                end.compact
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

              def build_sermon_data(sermon_element)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                title = extract_text(sermon_element, @config[:selectors][:title])
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                source_url = extract_url(sermon_element)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                # Skip if we don't have the minimum required data
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                return nil if title.blank? || source_url.blank?
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                {
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  title: title,
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  scripture: extract_text(sermon_element, @config[:selectors][:scripture]),
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  pastor: extract_text(sermon_element, @config[:selectors][:pastor]),
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  sermon_date: parse_date(extract_text(sermon_element, @config[:selectors][:date])),
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  church: @church_name,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  source_url: source_url,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                }
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              def extract_text(element, selector)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                return "" if selector.blank?
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                text = element.css(selector).text.strip
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                text.present? ? text : ""
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              def extract_url(element)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                link = element.css("a").first
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                return nil unless link
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                href = link["href"]
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                return nil if href.blank?
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                # Convert relative URLs to absolute URLs
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                if href.start_with?("/")
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  uri = URI.parse(@config[:url])
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  "#{uri.scheme}://#{uri.host}#{href}"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                else
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  href
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              def parse_date(date_string)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                return nil if date_string.blank?
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                DateTime.parse(date_string)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

              rescue ArgumentError => e
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.warn "Failed to parse date '#{date_string}': #{e.message}"
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                nil
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

              end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

              def save_sermons(sermons)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                return [] if sermons.empty?
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Saving #{sermons.size} sermons for #{@church_name}"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                saved_count = 0
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                failed_count = 0
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                new_sermons = []
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                # Process in batches to manage memory and improve performance
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                sermons.each_slice(50) do |sermon_batch|
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  batch_result = save_sermon_batch(sermon_batch)
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  saved_count += batch_result[:saved]
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  failed_count += batch_result[:failed]
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  new_sermons.concat(batch_result[:new_sermons])
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  # Garbage collect after each batch to manage memory
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  GC.start if sermons.size > 100
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Sermon save results: #{saved_count} saved, #{failed_count} failed"
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                # Clear relevant caches since new sermons were added
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                clear_sermon_caches if saved_count > 0
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                new_sermons
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

              end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              def save_sermon_batch(sermon_batch)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                saved_count = 0
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                failed_count = 0
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                new_sermons = []
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                # Use transaction for batch processing
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                Sermon.transaction do
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  sermon_batch.each do |sermon_data|
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                    result = save_single_sermon_optimized(sermon_data)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                    if result[:success]
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                      saved_count += 1
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                      new_sermons << result[:sermon] if result[:is_new]
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    else
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                      failed_count += 1
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                { saved: saved_count, failed: failed_count, new_sermons: new_sermons }
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Batch save failed: #{e.message}"
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                { saved: 0, failed: sermon_batch.size, new_sermons: [] }
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

              end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

              def save_single_sermon_optimized(sermon_data)
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                # Use find_or_initialize_by for better performance
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                sermon = Sermon.find_or_initialize_by(source_url: sermon_data[:source_url]) do |s|
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  s.assign_attributes(sermon_data.except(:source_url))
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                is_new = sermon.new_record?
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                if sermon.save
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  { success: true, sermon: sermon, is_new: is_new }
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                else
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Failed to save sermon: #{sermon.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  { success: false, error: sermon.errors.full_messages }
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                end
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Error saving sermon: #{e.message}"
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

              end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

              def clear_sermon_caches
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                Rails.cache.delete("sermon_counts")
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                Rails.cache.delete_matched("recent_sermons_*")
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                Rails.cache.delete("dashboard_stats")
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              end
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

            
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

              def save_single_sermon(sermon_data)
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                sermon = Sermon.find_or_initialize_by(source_url: sermon_data[:source_url])
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                # Only update if this is a new record or the data has changed
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                if sermon.new_record? || sermon_attributes_changed?(sermon, sermon_data)
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  sermon.assign_attributes(sermon_data)
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

            
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  if sermon.save
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Saved sermon: #{sermon.title}"
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                    true
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                  else
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to save sermon '#{sermon_data[:title]}': #{sermon.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                    false
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                  end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                else
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Skipping unchanged sermon: #{sermon.title}"
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  true
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

              end
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

              def sermon_attributes_changed?(sermon, new_data)
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                %i[title scripture pastor sermon_date church].any? do |attr|
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                  sermon.send(attr) != new_data[attr]
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                end
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

              end
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

            end
          
      259.

    app/services/video_generator_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    148 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 148 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            require "open3"
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            require "fileutils"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            require "securerandom"
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            require "json"
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            class VideoGeneratorService
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              # Configuration constants
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              BACKGROUND_VIDEOS_DIR = Rails.root.join("storage", "background_videos").freeze
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              OUTPUT_DIR = Rails.root.join("storage", "generated_videos").freeze
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              TEMP_DIR = Rails.root.join("tmp", "video_processing").freeze
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              # Video processing constants
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              MAX_SCRIPT_LENGTH = 5000
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              MAX_AUDIO_DURATION = 300 # 5 minutes
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              VIDEO_WIDTH = 1080
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              VIDEO_HEIGHT = 1920
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              VIDEO_FPS = 30
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              # Error classes
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              class VideoGenerationError < StandardError; end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              class ScriptTooLongError < VideoGenerationError; end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              class AudioGenerationError < VideoGenerationError; end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              class VideoProcessingError < VideoGenerationError; end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              class UploadError < VideoGenerationError; end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              def initialize(video)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                @video = video
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                @sermon = video.sermon
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                @unique_id = SecureRandom.hex(8)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                validate_inputs!
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                setup_directories
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              def generate
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting video generation for video #{@video.id}"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                @video.start_processing!
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                audio_file = generate_audio
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                video_file = generate_video(audio_file)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                youtube_id = upload_to_youtube(video_file)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                @video.complete_upload!(youtube_id)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Video generation completed for video #{@video.id}"
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Error generating video #{@video.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                @video.mark_failed!(e.message)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                raise e
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              ensure
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                cleanup_temp_files
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              private
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              def validate_inputs!
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                raise ArgumentError, "Video is required" unless @video
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                raise ArgumentError, "Sermon is required" unless @sermon
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                raise ScriptTooLongError, "Script too long" if @video.script.length > MAX_SCRIPT_LENGTH
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                raise ArgumentError, "Script cannot be empty" if @video.script.blank?
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              def setup_directories
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                [ BACKGROUND_VIDEOS_DIR, OUTPUT_DIR, TEMP_DIR ].each do |dir|
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir) unless Dir.exist?(dir)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              def generate_audio
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Generating audio for video #{@video.id}"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                audio_file = TEMP_DIR.join("audio_#{@unique_id}.mp3")
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                config_file = create_audio_config
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                # Use a secure approach with configuration file instead of direct script injection
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                execute_python_with_config("generate_audio.py", config_file)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                unless File.exist?(audio_file)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  raise AudioGenerationError, "Audio file was not created"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                audio_file
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              def generate_video(audio_file)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Generating video for video #{@video.id}"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                background_video = select_background_video
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                output_path = OUTPUT_DIR.join("video_#{@unique_id}.mp4")
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                config_file = create_video_config(background_video, audio_file, output_path)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                # Use secure configuration-based approach
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                execute_python_with_config("generate_video.py", config_file)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                unless File.exist?(output_path)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  raise VideoProcessingError, "Video file was not created"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                @video.update(video_path: output_path.to_s)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                output_path
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              def upload_to_youtube(video_file)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Uploading video #{@video.id} to YouTube"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                return upload_to_youtube_api(video_file) if File.exist?(video_file)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                raise UploadError, "Video file does not exist for upload"
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              def select_background_video
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                video_files = Dir.glob(BACKGROUND_VIDEOS_DIR.join("*.{mp4,avi,mov}"))
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                if video_files.empty?
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  raise VideoProcessingError, "No background videos available"
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                # Select a random background video or implement more sophisticated logic
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                video_files.sample
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

              end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              def create_audio_config
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                config = {
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  script_text: sanitize_script(@video.script),
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  output_file: TEMP_DIR.join("audio_#{@unique_id}.mp3").to_s,
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  language: "ko",
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  max_duration: MAX_AUDIO_DURATION,
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                }
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                config_file = TEMP_DIR.join("audio_config_#{@unique_id}.json")
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                File.write(config_file, JSON.pretty_generate(config))
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                config_file
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              def create_video_config(background_video, audio_file, output_path)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                config = {
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  background_video: background_video.to_s,
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  audio_file: audio_file.to_s,
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  output_file: output_path.to_s,
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  width: VIDEO_WIDTH,
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  height: VIDEO_HEIGHT,
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  fps: VIDEO_FPS,
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  scripture_text: sanitize_scripture(@sermon.scripture),
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  font: "Arial",
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  text_color: "white",
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  text_size: [ 900, nil ],
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  text_position: [ "center", "center" ],
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                }
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                config_file = TEMP_DIR.join("video_config_#{@unique_id}.json")
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                File.write(config_file, JSON.pretty_generate(config))
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                config_file
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

              end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

              def sanitize_script(script)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                # Remove potentially dangerous content and normalize
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                sanitized = script.to_s.strip
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                sanitized = sanitized.gsub(/[^\w\s\p{L}\p{P}]/, "") # Keep only word chars, spaces, letters, punctuation
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                sanitized = sanitized.truncate(MAX_SCRIPT_LENGTH)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                sanitized
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              def sanitize_scripture(scripture)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                # Extra sanitization for scripture text that goes into video overlay
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                return "" if scripture.blank?
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                sanitized = scripture.to_s.strip
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                sanitized = sanitized.gsub(/[<>\"'&]/, "") # Remove HTML/script dangerous chars
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                sanitized = sanitized.truncate(200) # Limit length for overlay
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                sanitized
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

              end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

              def execute_python_with_config(_script_name, _config_file)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                # This is a placeholder for secure Python execution
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                # In a real implementation, you would:
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                # 1. Use pre-written, vetted Python scripts
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                # 2. Pass configuration via secure files (not code injection)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                # 3. Use containers or sandboxed environments
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                # 4. Validate all inputs thoroughly
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.warn "Python execution is disabled for security. Implement proper sandboxed execution."
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                # Return a mock success for now
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                { success: true, message: "Mock execution - implement secure Python runner" }
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              def cleanup_temp_files
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Cleaning up temp files for video #{@video.id}"
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                pattern = TEMP_DIR.join("*#{@unique_id}*")
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                Dir.glob(pattern).each do |file|
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  File.delete(file)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Deleted temp file: #{file}"
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to delete temp file #{file}: #{e.message}"
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

              end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

              def upload_to_youtube_api(_video_path)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                # TODO: Implement actual YouTube upload logic using Google API client
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                # This should use proper OAuth2 authentication and the YouTube Data API v3
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Mock YouTube upload for video #{@video.id}"
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                # For now, return a mock YouTube ID
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                # In real implementation, this would:
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                # 1. Authenticate with YouTube API
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                # 2. Upload the video file
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                # 3. Set proper metadata (title, description, tags)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                # 4. Return the actual YouTube video ID
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                "mock_youtube_id_#{@unique_id}"
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

              end
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

            end

    app/validators/business_parameter_validator.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    391 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 391 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # Comprehensive business parameter validation for all Words of Truth operations
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            class BusinessParameterValidator < ActiveModel::EachValidator
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # Business-specific validation rules
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              VALIDATION_RULES = {
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                sermon_title: {
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  min_length: 5,
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  max_length: 255,
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  required_elements: [],
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  forbidden_patterns: [/\b(test|sample|lorem)\b/i],
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  business_rules: [:title_uniqueness_per_church, :appropriate_language]
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                },
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                scripture_reference: {
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  format: /\A\d*\s*[A-Za-z]+(?:\s+\d+)?(?::\d+(?:-\d+)?)?\z/,
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  valid_books: %w[Genesis Exodus Leviticus Numbers Deuteronomy Joshua Judges Ruth Samuel Kings Chronicles Ezra Nehemiah Esther Job Psalms Proverbs Ecclesiastes Song Isaiah Jeremiah Lamentations Ezekiel Daniel Hosea Joel Amos Obadiah Jonah Micah Nahum Habakkuk Zephaniah Haggai Zechariah Malachi Matthew Mark Luke John Acts Romans Corinthians Galatians Ephesians Philippians Colossians Thessalonians Timothy Titus Philemon Hebrews James Peter Jude Revelation],
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  business_rules: [:canonical_book_validation, :chapter_verse_validation]
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                },
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                church_name: {
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  min_length: 2,
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  max_length: 100,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  format: /\A[A-Za-z\s\-'\.]+\z/,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  business_rules: [:church_name_standards, :duplicate_prevention]
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                },
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                pastor_name: {
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  min_length: 2,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  max_length: 100,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  format: /\A[A-Za-z\s\-'\.]+\z/,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  business_rules: [:name_formatting, :title_validation]
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                },
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                denomination: {
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  allowed_values: %w[Presbyterian Baptist Methodist Lutheran Pentecostal Episcopal Catholic Orthodox Non-denominational Other],
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  business_rules: [:denomination_consistency]
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                },
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                interpretation_content: {
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  min_length: 100,
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  max_length: 10000,
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  forbidden_patterns: [
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    /<script[^>]*>/i,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    /javascript:/i,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    /\bon(load|error|click)\s*=/i
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  ],
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  business_rules: [:theological_appropriateness, :content_quality, :language_appropriateness]
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                },
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                action_points: {
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  min_length: 20,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  max_length: 2000,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  business_rules: [:actionable_content, :practical_application]
          
      54.

                },
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                audience_count: {
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  min_value: 1,
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  max_value: 100000,
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  business_rules: [:realistic_count, :consistent_reporting]
          
      60.

                },
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                video_script: {
          
      63.

                  min_length: 50,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  max_length: 10000,
          
      65.

                  business_rules: [:script_completeness, :appropriate_length, :content_alignment]
          
      66.

                },
          
      67.

      68.
