            # Custom validators for enhanced security and input validation
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            class SecurityValidator < ActiveModel::EachValidator
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              def validate_each(record, attribute, value)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                return if value.blank?
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                case options[:type]
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                when :url
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  validate_url(record, attribute, value)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                when :scripture_reference
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  validate_scripture_reference(record, attribute, value)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                when :content
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  validate_content_security(record, attribute, value)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                when :filename
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  validate_filename_security(record, attribute, value)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                when :email
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  validate_email_security(record, attribute, value)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              private
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              def validate_url(record, attribute, value)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                # Parse and validate URL
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                begin
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  uri = URI.parse(value)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  # Must be HTTP or HTTPS
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  unless %w[http https].include?(uri.scheme&.downcase)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    record.errors.add(attribute, 'must be a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL')
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    return
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  # Check for suspicious patterns
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  if suspicious_url?(value)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    record.errors.add(attribute, 'contains suspicious content')
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    return
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  # Check for SSRF vulnerabilities
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  if ssrf_vulnerable?(uri)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    record.errors.add(attribute, 'targets internal/private network')
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    return
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                rescue URI::InvalidURIError
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, 'is not a valid URL')
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              def validate_scripture_reference(record, attribute, value)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                # Validate scripture reference format
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                # Expected formats: "John 3:16", "1 Corinthians 13:1-13", "Psalm 23"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                scripture_pattern = /\A\d*\s*[A-Za-z]+(?:\s+\d+)?(?::\d+(?:-\d+)?)?\z/
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                unless value.match?(scripture_pattern)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, 'is not a valid scripture reference format')
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                # Check for potential injection attempts
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                if contains_injection_patterns?(value)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, 'contains invalid characters')
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              def validate_content_security(record, attribute, value)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                # Check for various security threats in content
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                # XSS patterns
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                xss_patterns = [
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  /<script[^>]*>/i,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  /javascript:/i,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  /vbscript:/i,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  /onload\s*=/i,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  /onerror\s*=/i,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  /onclick\s*=/i,
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  /<iframe[^>]*>/i,
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  /<object[^>]*>/i,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  /<embed[^>]*>/i,
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  /<link[^>]*>/i,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  /<meta[^>]*>/i
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                ]
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                if xss_patterns.any? { |pattern| value.match?(pattern) }
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, 'contains potentially malicious content')
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  return
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                # SQL injection patterns
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                sql_patterns = [
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  /union\s+select/i,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  /drop\s+table/i,
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  /delete\s+from/i,
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  /insert\s+into/i,
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  /update\s+set/i,
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  /;\s*--/,
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  /'\s*or\s*'1'\s*=\s*'1/i
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                ]
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                if sql_patterns.any? { |pattern| value.match?(pattern) }
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, 'contains suspicious SQL patterns')
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  return
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                # Check content length for DoS protection
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                if value.length > 50_000 # 50KB limit
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, 'exceeds maximum length limit')
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              def validate_filename_security(record, attribute, value)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                # Validate filename for path traversal and other attacks
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                # Path traversal patterns
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                if value.include?('..') || value.include?('/') || value.include?('\\')
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, 'contains invalid path characters')
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  return
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                # Dangerous file extensions
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                dangerous_extensions = %w[
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  .exe .bat .cmd .com .pif .scr .vbs .js .jar .app .deb .pkg .dmg
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  .php .asp .aspx .jsp .py .rb .pl .sh .bash .ps1
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                ]
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                if dangerous_extensions.any? { |ext| value.downcase.end_with?(ext) }
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, 'has a potentially dangerous file extension')
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  return
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                # Check for null bytes and control characters
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                if value.match?(/[\x00-\x1f\x7f-\x9f]/n)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, 'contains invalid control characters')
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

              end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              def validate_email_security(record, attribute, value)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                # Enhanced email validation beyond format
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                # Check for email injection patterns
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                injection_patterns = [
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  /\r|\n/,  # CRLF injection
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  /%0a|%0d/i,  # URL encoded CRLF
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  /bcc:/i,
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  /cc:/i,
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  /to:/i,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  /from:/i,
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  /subject:/i,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  /content-type:/i
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                ]
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                if injection_patterns.any? { |pattern| value.match?(pattern) }
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, 'contains email injection patterns')
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  return
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                # Check for suspicious domains
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                if suspicious_email_domain?(value)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  record.errors.add(attribute, 'uses a suspicious domain')
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              def suspicious_url?(url)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                # Check for various suspicious URL patterns
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                suspicious_patterns = [
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  /data:/i,          # Data URLs can contain malicious code
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  /javascript:/i,    # JavaScript URLs
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  /vbscript:/i,      # VBScript URLs
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  /file:/i,          # File URLs
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  /ftp:/i,           # FTP URLs might be suspicious in this context
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  /@.*@/,            # Double @ signs (phishing technique)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  /[%][0-9a-f]{2}/i, # URL encoded characters (potential obfuscation)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                ]
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                suspicious_patterns.any? { |pattern| url.match?(pattern) }
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

              end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

              def ssrf_vulnerable?(uri)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                return false unless uri.host
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                # Check for private/internal IP ranges
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                begin
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  ip = IPAddr.new(uri.host)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  # Private IP ranges
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  private_ranges = [
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    IPAddr.new('10.0.0.0/8'),
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                    IPAddr.new('172.16.0.0/12'),
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                    IPAddr.new('192.168.0.0/16'),
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                    IPAddr.new('127.0.0.0/8'),     # Loopback
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                    IPAddr.new('169.254.0.0/16'),  # Link-local
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                    IPAddr.new('::1/128'),         # IPv6 loopback
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                    IPAddr.new('fc00::/7'),        # IPv6 private
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  ]
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  private_ranges.any? { |range| range.include?(ip) }
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                rescue IPAddr::InvalidAddressError
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  # If it's not an IP address, check for localhost/internal hostnames
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  internal_hosts = %w[localhost internal local intranet admin test staging dev]
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  internal_hosts.any? { |host| uri.host.downcase.include?(host) }
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

              def contains_injection_patterns?(value)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                # Check for common injection patterns
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                injection_patterns = [
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  /<[^>]*>/,        # HTML tags
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  /[;&|`$()]/,      # Command injection characters
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  /['"]/,           # SQL injection quotes (in scripture context)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  /[{}]/,           # Template injection
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                ]
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                injection_patterns.any? { |pattern| value.match?(pattern) }
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

              def suspicious_email_domain?(email)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                domain = email.split('@').last&.downcase
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                return false unless domain
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                # List of suspicious TLDs or domains
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                suspicious_domains = %w[
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  guerrillamail.com
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  10minutemail.com
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  mailinator.com
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                  tempmail.org
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  throwaways.email
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                ]
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                # Check for suspicious patterns
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                suspicious_patterns = [
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                  /^\d+\./,           # Domains starting with numbers
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  /[.-]{2,}/,         # Multiple consecutive dots or dashes
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  /^[.-]/,            # Starting with dot or dash
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  /[.-]$/,            # Ending with dot or dash
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                ]
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                suspicious_domains.include?(domain) || 
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  suspicious_patterns.any? { |pattern| domain.match?(pattern) }
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

              end
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

            end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

            
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

            # Additional specific validators
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

            class UrlSecurityValidator < SecurityValidator
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

              def validate_each(record, attribute, value)
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                super(record, attribute, value) if options[:type] == :url
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

              end
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

            end
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

            class ContentSecurityValidator < SecurityValidator
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

              def validate_each(record, attribute, value)
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                super(record, attribute, value) if options[:type] == :content
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

              end
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

            end

            # Performance Profiler for Words of Truth Core Algorithms
          
      2.

            #

            class PerformanceProfiler
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              PROFILE_DIR = Rails.root.join('tmp', 'performance_profiles')
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              class << self
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                def setup_profiling_environment
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  FileUtils.mkdir_p(PROFILE_DIR)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  puts "Performance profiling setup complete. Reports saved to: #{PROFILE_DIR}"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                # Profile SermonCrawlerService core algorithms
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                def profile_sermon_crawler(iterations: 10, sample_size: 100)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  setup_profiling_environment
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  puts "\n=== Profiling SermonCrawlerService ==="
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  # Setup test data
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  sample_urls = generate_sample_church_urls(sample_size)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # Profile with StackProf (sampling profiler)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  stackprof_profile('sermon_crawler_stackprof') do
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    iterations.times do |i|
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      puts "Iteration #{i + 1}/#{iterations}"
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                      sample_urls.each_with_index do |url, idx|
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                        config = { 'url' => url, 'selectors' => default_selectors }
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                        service = SermonCrawlerService.new("test_church_#{idx}", config)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                        # Mock external HTTP calls for consistent profiling
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                        mock_http_response_for_profiling(service)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                        service.crawl
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  # Profile with RubyProf (deterministic profiler)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  rubyprof_profile('sermon_crawler_rubyprof', RubyProf::WALL_TIME) do
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    5.times do # Fewer iterations for deterministic profiling
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                      sample_urls.first(10).each_with_index do |url, idx|
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                        config = { 'url' => url, 'selectors' => default_selectors }
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                        service = SermonCrawlerService.new("test_church_#{idx}", config)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                        mock_http_response_for_profiling(service)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                        service.crawl
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                      end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  # Memory profiling
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  memory_profile('sermon_crawler_memory') do
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    sample_urls.first(20).each_with_index do |url, idx|
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                      config = { 'url' => url, 'selectors' => default_selectors }
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      service = SermonCrawlerService.new("test_church_#{idx}", config)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      mock_http_response_for_profiling(service)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      service.crawl
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                # Profile VideoGeneratorService algorithms

                  # Setup test videos with varying script lengths

                  test_videos = create_test_videos_for_profiling(video_count)

    76. 
            

            

                  
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  stackprof_profile('video_generator_stackprof') do
          
      78.

      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                      puts "Video Generation Iteration #{i + 1}/#{iterations}"
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                      test_videos.each do |video|
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                        service = VideoGeneratorService.new(video)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                        # Mock external file operations for consistent profiling
          
      83.

                        mock_video_operations_for_profiling(service)

      85.

      86.

                    end

                  rubyprof_profile('video_generator_rubyprof', RubyProf::WALL_TIME) do
          
      90.

                    test_videos.first(10).each do |video|
          
      91.
